name: Versus: The Elite Trials
storyline:
In this sequel to VERSUS: The Lost Ones, you and your fellow prisoners trapped on planet Versus must vote for who will fight in deadly gladiatorial battles. Thirteen prisoners have formed a voting block, the Elite Courte, to ensure that they choose who lives and who dies.

But one of their so-called gods has a plan for revolution. Your power to steal superpowers and memories makes you the perfect spy—or the perfect double agent.

MemoryTravel through time and space—staying one step ahead of the enforcer agents who want you dead. Play the gods against each other in games within games. Design your own planet in the halls of the gods.

On Versus, nothing and no one is as it seems, perhaps not even you.
summary: Will you infiltrate the gods' Elite Courte, stealing their superpowers, or turn double agent and join them, taking your place among the divine?
